Meet me

About Me

Hello, my name is Paulo Rigter, I'm from Portugal, and I've always had a passion for coding. Started later, I'm my 30s, but I've been hooked ever since. I enjoy working on the frontend side, currently learning REACT. I am always eager to learn new things and grow as a developer. I've been learning NodeJS, Express, Mongoose, towards to make fullstack applications. When I'm not on the code editor, I enjoy time with my family, playing with my dog, meditate, excercise, playing tennis.

Portfolio

  • Waitlist Subscription

    A simple Web App, connecting to a MySQL Database. Fetching for data (users) present in the Database, and displaying it on the homepage. With a form allowing new registrations.

    What I learned

    • Getting experience with Back-end: Node/Express
    • Using REGEX, for email validation
    • Connection with MySQL Database: ClearDB

  • Where in the World?

    Integration with REST Countries API - Users should be able to:

    • See all countries from the API & Filter countries by region
    • Search for a country using an input field
    • Click a country & get detailed info on a separate page
    • Toggle the color scheme between light and dark mode

    What I've learned

    • Getting experience with FETCH API
    • Using Local Storage
    • DOM manipulation & Event Listener

  • Battleship Game

    A BattleShip Game based on "Head First Javascript Programming - O'Reilly" Book.

    What I learned

    • Getting experience with MVC architectural pattern
    • Using HOWLER - JS Audio Library
    • Vanilla JavaScript & CSS Animations

  • Restfull Gallery App

    A Dog's photo Gallery App, getting familiar with RESTfull pattern. User can make new entries, edit existing posts, or delete, if they are logged in.

    What I learned

    • Getting experience with RESTfull pattern
    • Getting experience with Enviroment Variables
    • Connection to MongoDB Database
    • Getting familiar with Authorization using Bcrypt
      • Password hash & Salt
    • Gettin familiar with Validation with Express-Session

  • 3 Little Widgets

    A simple 3 Widgets App, getting data from 3 different API's, displaying Weather information + Bitcoin price + Inspiration Quote. App is using HTML Geolocation.

    What I learned

    • Getting familiar with HTML Geolocation
    • Getting experience with FETCH API
